mapper.select: SELECT qna_no, qna_type, qna_title, qna_writer, DATE_FORMAT(qna_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as qna_date, qna_status FROM qnaboard ORDER BY qna_no DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnaboard (qna_type, qna_title, qna_writer, qna_content, qna_date, qna_status, qna_delYn) VALUES (#{qna_type}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_date}, #{qna_status}, #{qna_delYn})
